 42  Declarations

 45#if !VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 46
 47namespace vsip_csl
 48{
 49namespace dispatcher
 50{
 51template <dimension_type D,
 52          symmetry_type S,
 53          support_region_type R,
 54          typename T,
 55          unsigned int N,
 56          alg_hint_type H>
 57struct List<op::conv<D, S, R, T, N, H> >
 58{
 59  typedef Make_type_list<be::cml,
 60			 be::intel_ipp,
 61			 be::mercury_sal,
 62			 be::cvsip,
 63			 be::generic>::type type;
 64};
 65} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
 66} // namespace vsip_csl
 67
 68#endif
 69
 70namespace vsip
 71{
 72
 73template <template <typename, typename> class ConstViewT,
 74	  symmetry_type                       Symm,
 75	  support_region_type                 Supp,
 76	  typename                            T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 77	  unsigned                            N_times = 0,
 78          alg_hint_type                       A_hint = alg_time>
 79class Convolution
 80  : public impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>,
 81#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 82    public impl::cvsip::Convolution<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 83                                    Symm, Supp, float, N_times, A_hint>
 84#else
 85    public vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
 86             vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::conv<
 87               impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
 88				 Symm,
 89				 Supp,
 90				 T,
 91				 N_times,
 92				 A_hint> >::backend_type
 93#endif
 94{
 95  // Implementation compile-time constants.
 96private: 
 97  static dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim;
 98
 99  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
100
101#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
102  typedef impl::cvsip::Convolution<impl::Dim_of_view<ConstViewT>::dim,
103                                   Symm, Supp, float, N_times, A_hint> base_type;
104#else
105  typedef typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
106    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::conv<dim,
107				   Symm,
108				   Supp,
109				   T,
110				   N_times,
111				   A_hint> >::backend_type base_type;
112#endif
113
114public:
115  template <typename Block>
116  Convolution(ConstViewT<T, Block> filter_coeffs,
117	      Domain<dim> const&   input_size,
118	      length_type          decimation = 1)
119    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
120      : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<dim, T>::tag
121                         ("Convolution",
122                          impl::extent(impl::conv_output_size
123                                       (Supp, view_domain(filter_coeffs), 
124                                        input_size, decimation)),
125                          impl::extent(filter_coeffs)),
126                         impl::signal_detail::Op_count_conv<dim, T>::value
127                         (impl::extent(impl::conv_output_size
128                                       (Supp, view_domain(filter_coeffs),
129                                        input_size, decimation)),
130                          impl::extent(filter_coeffs))),
131        base_type(filter_coeffs, input_size, decimation)
132  {
133    assert(decimation >= 1);
134    assert(Symm == nonsym ? (filter_coeffs.size() <=   input_size.size())
135			  : (filter_coeffs.size() <= 2*input_size.size()));
136  }
137
138  Convolution(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
139  Convolution& operator=(Convolution const&) VSIP_NOTHROW;
140  ~Convolution() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
141
142  // Convolution operators.
143public:
144#if USE_IMPL_VIEWS
145  template <template <typename, typename> class V1,
146	    template <typename, typename> class V2,
147	    typename Block1,
148	    typename Block2>
149  typename impl::View_of_dim<dim, T, Block2>::type
150  operator()(
151    impl_const_View<V1, Block1, T, dim> in,
152    impl_View<V2, Block2, T, dim>       out)
153    VSIP_NOTHROW
154  {
155    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
156
157    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
158      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
159
160    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
161      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
162
163    convolve(in.impl_view(), out.impl_view());
164
165    return out;
166  }
167#else
168  template <typename Block1,
169	    typename Block2>
170  Vector<T, Block2>
171  operator()(
172    const_Vector<T, Block1> in,
173    Vector<T, Block2>       out)
174    VSIP_NOTHROW
175  {
176    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
177
178    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
179      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
180
181    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
182      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
183
184    convolve(in, out);
185
186    return out;
187  }
188
189  template <typename Block1,
190	    typename Block2>
191  Matrix<T, Block2>
192  operator()(
193    const_Matrix<T, Block1> in,
194    Matrix<T, Block2>       out)
195    VSIP_NOTHROW
196  {
197    typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
198
199    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
200      assert(in.size(d) == this->input_size()[d].size());
201
202    for (dimension_type d=0; d<dim; ++d)
203      assert(out.size(d) == this->output_size()[d].size());
204
205    convolve(in, out);
206
207    return out;
208  }
209#endif
210
211  float impl_performance(char const* what) const
212  {
213    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->mops();
214    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->total();
215    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
216    else return this->base_type::impl_performance(what);
217  }
218};
219
220} // namespace vsip
221
222#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_CONV_HPP
